section.title: Addition of entities
section.p: Following is the sequence of steps:

li.p: The API request (SOAP or REST) from Customer Relationship Management (CRM) portal is load balanced to the SM application.
The SM application validates the request, queries and updates the object location database.
The SM application sends the request to the selected SPS, which load balances the request to a provisioning application.
The provisioning application creates the object in the database including the references to the other objects.
The DB replicates the object to the neighbor SPS for that subscriber.
The DB replicates the device mapping record to all the other SPS systems.

section.title: LDAP query
section.p: Following is the sequence of steps:

li.p: The LDAP request arrives at SM and is load balanced to the SM application, which mediates the request using rules.
The SM application queries the locator DB to find the SPS for the subscriber.
The SM application requests the data from the specified SPS through the SPS HTTP IOH, which load balances the request to a provisioning application.
The SPS provisioning application queries the DB and returns the result.
